author: erans
msg: Code cleanup: Removed unnecessary parentheses, empty lines.
Bitwise operator replaced by logical one.

author: astitcher
msg: QPID-3405: Added simple C++ system tests for IPv6:
- short perftest run which connects to ::1 (old client API)
- qpid-send/qpid-receive sending messages between them (new messaging API)
- Simple 2 broker federation over IPv6 test
- Simple cluster failover via IPv6 test

author: astitcher
msg: QPID-3409: Fixup federation tools to allow IPv6 literals as part of the address in broker URLs

author: astitcher
msg: QPID-3407: Change python connection url to allow ipv6 literal style addresses.

author: astitcher
msg: QPID-3407: Add IPv6 connections to python
